org.magelan.core.style
Class Layer

java.lang.Object
  org.magelan.core.style.AbstractNamedStyle
      org.magelan.core.style.Layer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Style
public class Layer
extends AbstractNamedStyle
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

Layers specify default color, linestyle and thickness of their entities.

Version:
3.0, 05/2004
Author:
Assen Antov
See Also:
Serialized Form
